issue.title: [Python] pyarrow build does not support RELWITHDEBINFO build type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17099](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17099). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I ran into this trying to bisect a Parquet regression that occurred between 2.0.0 and 3.0.0 – because CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=debug adds -Werror, this can cause builds to fail, but we need debug symbols to use gdb
